extensionAttribute.description: This attribute displays the power management profile that is currently active on the machine. This attribute applies to both Mac and Windows.
extensionAttribute.scriptContentsWindows: On Error Resume Next Dim WshShell Dim oExec Dim strPowerProfile Set WshShell = WScript.CreateObject("Wscript.Shell") Set oExec = WshShell.Exec("powercfg -GETACTIVESCHEME") strPowerProfile = oExec.StdOut.ReadAll strPowerProfile = Replace (strPowerProfile, Chr(40), "", 58) strPowerProfile = Replace (strPowerProfile, Chr(41), "") WScript.Echo "<result>" & strPowerProfile & "</result>"
